      • isBinPersistance

        public boolean isBinPersistance()
        Check if current persistance is set to binary.
        Returns:
        true if is binary, otherwise false (XML persistance).

      • changePersistance

        public void changePersistance()
        Method for change current persistance. Switch between binary and XML. Always changed one type to the other.

      • isNameFirst

        public boolean isNameFirst()
        Gets current settings for showing contact name.
        Returns:
        true if firstname should be show as first, false for first surname.

      • changeNameOrder

        public void changeNameOrder()
        Changed displaying first firstname or surname. Method changed the current state to the second value.

      • instance

        public static Settings instance()
        Static accessor for access to the singleton instance.

      • setDefaultProperties

        Sets the default properties values, if properties file missing.
